dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4698 IH: Judicial Redaction Authority Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Jeffries introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To protect the safety of judges by extending the authority of the Judicial Conference to redact sensitive information contained in their financial disclosure reports, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Judicial Redaction Authority Act of 2017.

section.header: Extension of redaction authority concerning sensitive security information
section.text: Section 105(b)(3) of the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 (5 U.S.C. App.) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (E), by striking 2017 both places it appears and inserting 2018.
